author: dnrtrdata
title: NVDA Killing it at the GDC 2017
text:
Dropped the price of their core GTX 1080 product from $699 to $499….sifting through reactions on r/nvidia their main user base seems pretty happy. 
Also released a new product (GTX 1080 TI). Watching their Keynote now does remind me a bit of Apple's classic Keynotes, flashy…high energy…innovative. 
Hopefully this revitalizes the stock a little bit tomorrow. I think it needs some of this energy. 
Submitted February 28, 2017 at 08:45PM by cfastudy
via http://ift.tt/2lRCAPr
